r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with MessagePack
r.d: This extension provide API for communicating with MessagePack serialization.
r.n: * PHP-8 compatibility. (Remi Collet, Michael Wallner) * Fixed #152: Split tests for #67 regarding 32/64bit platforms. (Andy Postnikov) * Fixed #153 and #147: Small string optimization causes excessive memory consumption under specific workloads. (Michael Wallner)
